name: Melvin the Moose Saves Christmas
description:
Melvin the Moose has always wanted to be one of Santa's reindeer, but has unsuccessful considering he is a moose, not a reindeer. One fateful Christmas night, Santa's pack of toys tears open, spilling presents over the landscape. Melvin races to the rescue, building more and more speed as he crashes through the landscape. Build speed to jump over gorges while avoiding obstacles.

Completed by Brett Page & Aidan Labut
